</h3><p class="mb-5"><h3>Annual Show Audit for CES&reg; 2024&nbsp;</h3>

<p>The Consumer Technology Association (CTA)<sup>&reg;&nbsp;</sup>announced its final attendance data for CES&nbsp;2024&mdash;the world&rsquo;s most powerful tech event&mdash;revealing 15% growth in the number of senior-level executives attending the show compared to the previous year.</p>
